citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
There was moderate accumulations of excreta covering the shelter roofs of chicken enclosures of pen 1, 4, 8, 13, 14, and
16. Excreta and food waste must be removed from enclosures as often as necessary to prevent excessive accumulations.
Failure to clean accumulations of excreta and food waste can increase disease risks, pests, and odors. Licensee must
ensure that animal enclosures are kept clean to prevent accumulations of excreta and food waste.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
Additional Inspectors:
Kira Wagner, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
